queries.sql: SELECT FIRSTWITHTIME(int_col, timestamp_col, 'INT'), FIRSTWITHTIME(string_col, timestamp_col, 'STRING'), first_with_time(bool_col, CAST(long_col AS TIMESTAMP), 'BOOLEAN') FROM {tbl}

SELECT bool_col, FIRSTWITHTIME(float_col, timestamp_col, 'FLOAT'), FIRSTWITHTIME(double_col, timestamp_col, 'DOUBLE'), first_with_time(long_col, CAST(long_col AS TIMESTAMP), 'LONG') FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col

SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ string_col, FIRSTWITHTIME(float_col, timestamp_col, 'FLOAT'), FIRSTWITHTIME(double_col, timestamp_col, 'DOUBLE'), first_with_time(long_col, CAST(long_col AS TIMESTAMP), 'LONG') FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
SELECT LASTWITHTIME(int_col, timestamp_col, 'INT'), LASTWITHTIME(string_col, timestamp_col, 'STRING'), last_with_time(bool_col, CAST(long_col AS TIMESTAMP), 'BOOLEAN') FROM {tbl}

SELECT bool_col, LASTWITHTIME(float_col, timestamp_col, 'FLOAT'), LASTWITHTIME(double_col, timestamp_col, 'DOUBLE'), last_with_time(long_col, CAST(long_col AS TIMESTAMP), 'LONG') FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col

SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ string_col, LASTWITHTIME(float_col, timestamp_col, 'FLOAT'), LASTWITHTIME(double_col, timestamp_col, 'DOUBLE'), last_with_time(long_col, CAST(long_col AS TIMESTAMP), 'LONG') FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
SELECT SUMPRECISION(decimal_col) FROM {tbl}
SELECT string_col, SUMPRECISION(decimal_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ string_col, SUMPRECISION(decimal_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
select min_max_range(int_col), minMaxRange(long_col), MIN_MAX_RANGE(float_col), MINMAXRANGE(double_col) FROM {tbl}
select bool_col, min_max_range(int_col), minMaxRange(long_col), MIN_MAX_RANGE(float_col), MINMAXRANGE(double_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col
select /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ bool_col, min_max_range(int_col), minMaxRange(long_col), MIN_MAX_RANGE(float_col), MINMAXRANGE(double_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col
select distinct_sum(int_col), distinctSum(long_col), DISTINCT_SUM(float_col), DISTINCTSUM(double_col) FROM {tbl}
select string_col, distinct_sum(int_col), distinctSum(long_col), DISTINCT_SUM(float_col), DISTINCTSUM(double_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
select /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ string_col, distinct_sum(int_col), distinctSum(long_col), DISTINCT_SUM(float_col), DISTINCTSUM(double_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
select distinct_avg(int_col), distinctAvg(long_col), DISTINCT_AVG(float_col), DISTINCTAVG(double_col) FROM {tbl}
select string_col, distinct_avg(int_col), distinctAvg(long_col), DISTINCT_AVG(float_col), DISTINCTAVG(double_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
select /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ string_col, distinct_avg(int_col), distinctAvg(long_col), DISTINCT_AVG(float_col), DISTINCTAVG(double_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
SELECT PERCENTILE(float_col, 50), PERCENTILE(double_col, 5), PERCENTILE(int_col, 75), PERCENTILE(long_col, 75) FROM {tbl}
SELECT bool_col, PERCENTILE(float_col, 50), PERCENTILE(double_col, 5), PERCENTILE(int_col, 75), PERCENTILE(long_col, 75) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col

SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ string_col, PERCENTILE(float_col, 50), PERCENTILE(double_col, 5), PERCENTILE(int_col, 75), PERCENTILE(long_col, 75) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
SELECT PERCENTILE_EST(float_col, 50), PERCENTILE_EST(double_col, 5), PERCENTILE_EST(int_col, 75), PERCENTILE_EST(long_col, 75) FROM {tbl}

SELECT PERCENTILE_TDIGEST(float_col, 50), PERCENTILE_TDIGEST(double_col, 5), PERCENTILE_TDIGEST(int_col, 75), PERCENTILE_TDIGEST(long_col, 75) FROM {tbl}
SELECT bool_col, PERCENTILE_TDIGEST(float_col, 50), PERCENTILE_TDIGEST(double_col, 5), PERCENTILE_TDIGEST(int_col, 75), PERCENTILE_TDIGEST(long_col, 75) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col

SELECT PERCENTILE_KLL(float_col, 50), PERCENTILE_KLL(double_col, 5), PERCENTILE_KLL(int_col, 75), PERCENTILE_KLL(long_col, 75) FROM {tbl}
SELECT bool_col, PERCENTILE_KLL(float_col, 50), PERCENTILE_KLL(double_col, 5), PERCENTILE_KLL(int_col, 75), PERCENTILE_KLL(long_col, 75) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col

select GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(string_col, 'nominalEntries=16')), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_DIFF(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''))), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_UNION(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(long_col, ''))), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_INTERSECT(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(double_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(float_col, 'nominalEntries=1000'))) FROM {tbl}

select bool_col, GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(string_col, 'nominalEntries=16')), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_DIFF(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''))), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_UNION(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(long_col, ''))), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_INTERSECT(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(double_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(float_col, 'nominalEntries=1000'))) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col

select /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ bool_col, GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(string_col, 'nominalEntries=16')), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_DIFF(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''))), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_UNION(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(int_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(long_col, ''))), GET_THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(THETA_SKETCH_INTERSECT(DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(double_col, ''), DISTINCT_COUNT_RAW_THETA_SKETCH(float_col, 'nominalEntries=1000'))) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col
select distinct_count_theta_sketch(int_col), distinctCountThetaSketch(long_col), DISTINCT_COUNT_THETA_SKETCH(float_col), DISTINCTCOUNTTHETASKETCH(double_col) FROM {tbl}

select string_col, distinct_count_theta_sketch(int_col), distinctCountThetaSketch(long_col), DISTINCT_COUNT_THETA_SKETCH(float_col), DISTINCTCOUNTTHETASKETCH(double_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col

select /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ string_col, distinct_count_theta_sketch(int_col), distinctCountThetaSketch(long_col), DISTINCT_COUNT_THETA_SKETCH(float_col), DISTINCTCOUNTTHETASKETCH(double_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
